name: 22Gz
description: '''Jeffrey Mark Alexander''' (born November 29, 1997), known professionally as '''22Gz''' ({{IPAc-en|t|u|t|u|'|d í|i:|z}} {{respell|too|too|JEEZ}}), is an American rapper credited as a pioneer of the [[Brooklyn drill]] scene. 22Gz released his first major mixtape, ''The Blixky Tape'', through [[Atlantic Records]] in 2019.
